import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const ProductAdmin = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ getProducts() },[]) const getProducts = async () => { const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/product") setProducts(response.data) } return (
Add New
{products.map((product) => (

{product.title}

@johnsmith

Detail Edit Delete
))}
) } export default ProductAdmin
